movie.title: 1987: When the Day Comes
movie.description_intro: In 1987 Korea, under an oppressive military regime, a college student gets killed during a police interrogation involving torture. Government officials are quick to cover up the death and order the body to be cremated. A prosecutor who is supposed to sign the cremation release, raises questions about a 21-year-old kid dying of a heart attack, and begins looking into the case for the truth. Despite a systematic attempt to silence everyone involved in the case, the truth gets out, causing an eruption of public outrage.
movie.description_full: In 1987 Korea, under an oppressive military regime, a college student gets killed during a police interrogation involving torture. Government officials are quick to cover up the death and order the body to be cremated. A prosecutor who is supposed to sign the cremation release, raises questions about a 21-year-old kid dying of a heart attack, and begins looking into the case for the truth. Despite a systematic attempt to silence everyone involved in the case, the truth gets out, causing an eruption of public outrage.

movies.title: Shocking Kung Fu of Huo's
movies.summary: 20 years after the Revolution of 1911, Huo Zhenshan opens a school to promote Chinese martial arts. But a new challenge in the black market emerges.
movies.description_full: 20 years after the Revolution of 1911, Huo Zhenshan opens a school to promote Chinese martial arts. But a new challenge in the black market emerges.
movies.synopsis: 20 years after the Revolution of 1911, Huo Zhenshan opens a school to promote Chinese martial arts. But a new challenge in the black market emerges.

movies.title: Stand Strong
movies.summary: Matt Webster measures his success by his possessions. Though he appears to have it all, pride of ownership does little to fill the void of a purposeless life. Broken relationships, isolation and pain for both himself and his family are the results of his pride and selfishness. Through a series of financial and family crises, Matt and his family are stripped of all they own and are humbled enough to learn what success is really all about.

movies.title: Ride the Hot Wind
movies.summary: Captain Shank is an outcast officer and gets dishonorably discharged. He tries to get back on his feet, but his reputation keeps following him around ruining everything. When he meets some bikers he gets caught up in the life he tries desperately to escape.
movies.description_full: Captain Shank is an outcast officer and gets dishonorably discharged. He tries to get back on his feet, but his reputation keeps following him around ruining everything. When he meets some bikers he gets caught up in the life he tries desperately to escape.

movies.title: Shanghai
movies.summary: An American man returns to a corrupt, Japanese-occupied Shanghai four months before Pearl Harbor and discovers his friend has been killed. While he unravels the mysteries of the death, he falls in love and discovers a much larger secret.
